attributes.review: When I was downloading this app it took 1790 years to download , and when It finally downloaded the ninja tortles came to my house but instead of being hero’s, they look at me and screamed, SACRIFICE SACRIFICE, they stole my toes and threw them into a pot and ate them, they then screamed, sacrifice the toes, and vomited my toes onto my floor, then they looked at me and cut of my fingers, and screamed, CHICKEN FINGERS, and they fried them, I’m currently using my mouth to write this review, since my fingers and toes are gone, please don’t download this app unless you wanna lose your toes and fingers, to the trump supporters.
attributes.title: My toes 😭

attributes.review: After downloading this app, I noticed that the size of my hands starting slowly decreasing. Eventually it became impossible to drink water without using both hands. It became difficult to tweet resulting in many of my messages  being incomprehensible. I finally had to stop use and seek medical help. After having to pay out of pocket for thousands of dollars worth of medical bills, I was diagnosed with itty bitty trump hand syndrome. Eventually it will spread to my brain, and I will become a Cheeto. Please do not download.
attributes.title: This app cost me thousands of dollars

attributes.review:
The app doesn't seem to function as advertised. Faulty menus and confusing navigation. I was hoping to use this app as a resource to be informed for November but it just causes more headache than convenience :( Also, after an eternity of installation time the opening page greets you with a rather unflattering shot of our president. Whoever approved the use of that photo should revise because I don't think it conveys the strength, and capability this relentless campaign usually strives to parody.  

Would love to see improvement.
attributes.title: Not helpful. Very problematic

attributes.review: so i downloaded this app not too long ago and from the start it was glitching. well i thought that if i redownloaded it the glitching would stop. wrong, it just got worse and worse over time. before i knew it my phone started glitching and would turn it self off randomly. well after awhile i had enough and deleted the app all together. well my phone was still acting pretty slow and come to find out the app gave my phone 7 viruses. 10 out of 10 do not recommend!!!!!!!!!
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: I was curious about Trumps campaign, so I downloaded the app. I almost instantly started noticing my phone glitching. I also noticed I would have random apps opened up on my phone and the slightest of differences as if someone had HACKED into my phone! The glitching got so much worse!! I deleted it and it all went back to normal. Do NOT download this app. They will hack into you phone and steal your information. I was open to learning about the Trump Administration but NOT ANYMORE. I’m not on the anti-trump wagon because of this experience :)) hehe
attributes.title: Glitchy phone

attributes.review: This app is one of the worst thing u can possibly download! I was on my way to Wendy’s to get a bowl of cereal from subway when I got a call from my girlfriend who is my mom’s friend cousins wife’s grandma and she told me she was pregnant and it wasn’t mine...😔I went home to feed her clothes to my hostage, but then realized my hostage was my girlfriend who is my mom’s friend cousins wife’s grandma. She escaped and got pregnant by my neighbors dog. I was enraged and told my pet neighbor that is human dog was cheating on him with my girlfriend who is my mom's friend cousins wife’s grandma. don’t download this app.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!!!!!!!

attributes.review: This app is absolutely trash. Before I downloaded it my phone was in perfect condition but after the instillation it continuously glitches. My phone calls have been cut off and other apps continuously are closed out since the trump trash app was installed. In addition, this app is tracking my location and has access to my personal data without my consent. This is a disgusting app I hope no one has to endure the annoyance and danger of the app. It should be removed as soon as possible
attributes.title: One of the worst apps ever🧚🏻‍♂️✨✨
